title: French Hortson cinema style 16mm projector
brief_description:
French Hortson cinema style 16mm projector. Unusual right-hand commercial projector, as used in European Cinemas. Manufactured in Paris, painted light blue, on cast iron stand. Model A.
1 of 2: Projector
2 of 2: Pedestal
